title: Binance Reintroduces Dash (DASH), ZCash (ZEC) to US Trading
text:
Binance Reintroduces Dash (DASH), ZCash (ZEC) to US Trading

Cryptocurrency News 51 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 10:21AM ET)

Binance Reintroduces Dash (DASH), ZCash (ZEC) to US Trading Binance.US listed three new digital assets - (DASH), ZCash (ZEC), and Algorand (ALGO) to trade in the USA. The listing comes just weeks after Asian exchanges were dropping coins with anonymous features. But DASH and ZEC can be used as regular assets, switching off the veiled transaction features. https://twitter.com/BinanceAmerica/status/1185605385098366976 Binance.US also carries Binance Coin (BNB), which is now presented as a utility asset. The exchange also expanded the activity of its native blockchain, Binance Chain, and the decentralized exchange. The DEX is also adding pairs and helping the influence of the BUSD stablecoin. This article appeared first on Cryptovest

Binance Reintroduces Dash (DASH), ZCash (ZEC) to US Trading
description: Binance Reintroduces Dash (DASH), ZCash (ZEC) to US Trading
